name: Compliance Dashboard Access for Driver and Non-Driver
description: As a Driver or Non-Driver, I want to click on the Compliance Dashboard module to view my personal compliance record

background.text: I am on the application home page
I am logged in as an authenticated user

scenarios.name: Driver successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver
I navigate to the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display the compliance icon
the module should display the "My Compliance Record" title

scenarios.name: Non-Driver successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page

steps.text: I am logged in as a Non-Driver
I navigate to the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display the compliance icon
the module should display the "My Compliance Record" title

scenarios.name: Driver successfully navigates to personal compliance record

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver
I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
I should see my personal compliance data
I should not see any list view of other users
I should not see other users' compliance records

scenarios.name: Non-Driver successfully navigates to personal compliance record

steps.text: I am logged in as a Non-Driver
I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
I should see my personal compliance data
I should not see any list view of other users
I should not see other users' compliance records

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements

steps.text: I am on the home page
I view the Compliance Dashboard module
the compliance icon should be visible and properly rendered
the "My Compliance Record" title should be clearly displayed
the module should be clickable
the module should have appropriate visual styling
I am logged in as a <user_role>
I access the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be able to click the module
I should access only my own compliance record

scenarios.name: Unauthenticated user cannot access Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am not logged in
I try to access the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be redirected to the login page

scenarios.name: Navigation fails when compliance service is unavailable

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver
the compliance service is temporarily unavailable
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see an appropriate error message
I should remain on the current page
I should be able to retry the action

scenarios.name: Module visibility fails for users without compliance access permissions

steps.text: I am logged in as a user without compliance access permissions
I view the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see other available modules for my role
I am logged in as a Driver
my session is about to expire
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
my session expires during navigation
I should be redirected to the login page
I should see a session timeout message

scenarios.name: User with minimum compliance data can access dashboard

steps.text: I am logged in as a new Driver with minimal compliance data
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should successfully navigate to my compliance record page
I should see my minimal compliance data displayed
the page should handle empty or minimal data gracefully

scenarios.name: User with maximum compliance history can access dashboard

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver with extensive compliance history
I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
I should successfully navigate to my compliance record page
I should see my complete compliance history
the page should load and display large datasets efficiently

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard access via keyboard navigation

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver
I am using keyboard navigation
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using Tab key
I press Enter key on the focused module
I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
the navigation should work the same as mouse click

scenarios.name: Alternative access through direct URL navigation

steps.text: I am logged in as a Driver
I navigate directly to the compliance record URL
I should be taken to my individual compliance record detail page
I should see my personal compliance data
the page should display the same content as clicking the module

gherkin_content:
Feature: Compliance Dashboard Access for Driver and Non-Driver
  As a Driver or Non-Driver, I want to click on the Compliance Dashboard module to view my personal compliance record

  Background:
    Given I am on the application home page
    And I am logged in as an authenticated user

  @smoke @positive @driver
  Scenario: Driver successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    When I navigate to the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display the compliance icon
    And the module should display the "My Compliance Record" title

  @smoke @positive @non-driver
  Scenario: Non-Driver successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page
    Given I am logged in as a Non-Driver
    When I navigate to the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display the compliance icon
    And the module should display the "My Compliance Record" title

  @positive @navigation @driver
  Scenario: Driver successfully navigates to personal compliance record
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    And I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
    And I should see my personal compliance data
    And I should not see any list view of other users
    And I should not see other users' compliance records

  @positive @navigation @non-driver
  Scenario: Non-Driver successfully navigates to personal compliance record
    Given I am logged in as a Non-Driver
    And I can see the Compliance Dashboard module on the home page
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
    And I should see my personal compliance data
    And I should not see any list view of other users
    And I should not see other users' compliance records

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements
    Given I am on the home page
    When I view the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the compliance icon should be visible and properly rendered
    And the "My Compliance Record" title should be clearly displayed
    And the module should be clickable
    And the module should have appropriate visual styling

  @positive @role-verification
  Scenario: Multiple user role access verification
    Given I am logged in as a <user_role>
    When I access the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should be able to click the module
    And I should access only my own compliance record

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Unauthenticated user cannot access Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am not logged in
    When I try to access the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should be redirected to the login page

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Navigation fails when compliance service is unavailable
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    And the compliance service is temporarily unavailable
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And I should remain on the current page
    And I should be able to retry the action

  @negative @permissions
  Scenario: Module visibility fails for users without compliance access permissions
    Given I am logged in as a user without compliance access permissions
    When I view the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should see other available modules for my role

  @negative @session
  Scenario: Session timeout during compliance navigation
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    And my session is about to expire
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    And my session expires during navigation
    Then I should be redirected to the login page
    And I should see a session timeout message

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: User with minimum compliance data can access dashboard
    Given I am logged in as a new Driver with minimal compliance data
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should successfully navigate to my compliance record page
    And I should see my minimal compliance data displayed
    And the page should handle empty or minimal data gracefully

  @edge-case @boundary
  Scenario: User with maximum compliance history can access dashboard
    Given I am logged in as a Driver with extensive compliance history
    When I click on the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should successfully navigate to my compliance record page
    And I should see my complete compliance history
    And the page should load and display large datasets efficiently

  @edge-case @accessibility
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard access via keyboard navigation
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    And I am using keyboard navigation
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using Tab key
    And I press Enter key on the focused module
    Then I should be navigated to my individual compliance record detail page
    And the navigation should work the same as mouse click

  @alternative-flow
  Scenario: Alternative access through direct URL navigation
    Given I am logged in as a Driver
    When I navigate directly to the compliance record URL
    Then I should be taken to my individual compliance record detail page
    And I should see my personal compliance data
    And the page should display the same content as clicking the module
